name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.provided.aliasmap.inmemory.batch-size
description: The batch size when iterating over the database backing the aliasmap

name: fs.s3a.attempts.maximum
description: How many times we should retry commands on transient errors.

name: dfs.client-write-packet-size
description: Packet size for clients to write

name: dfs.client.retry.times.get-last-block-length
description: Number of retries for calls to fetchLocatedBlocksAndGetLastBlockLength().

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.suspectnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing suspect node behavior.

name: ftp.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: ha.health-monitor.sleep-after-disconnect.ms
description: How long to sleep after an unexpected RPC error.

name: dfs.client.socket-timeout
description: Default timeout value in milliseconds for all sockets.
